content.detailedDescription:
i got off the bus with a backpack of books in the middle of the evening after a few hours' visit to asu's library . the neighborhood of small businesses and offices was dimly lit at that time of evening, and no people or cars were moving in the vicinity, nothing distracting my thoughts or vision. as i walked eastward, a phalanx of seven lights came directly overhead from behind me, flying very low, maybe 60-80 ft., it seemed. my first thought that it was strange that a jet would be flying so directly eastward at such a height; but there was no noise at all accompanying the lights. i strained to make out a shape, but couldn't make out anything between the lights. but they moved with completely uniformity. i felt confusion for several moments as my mind instinctively sought for a familiar pattern, and then i experienced apprehensiveness and a growing thrill as i realized that this thing that was moving just a bit above me, slowly and silently, was completely foreign to anything i'd ever witnessed. it moved with an uncommon slowness, so that at walking speed i was not being rapidly outpaced. i had an impression of its bulk and smoothness of motion; the mere visual description can't capture the feeling that it was moving in a different kind of space, which gave it a sort of presence. i don't mean a sensed intelligence or something of that kind; though there was a kind of leisureliness about it, the sort we associate with a car of sightseers. there was nothing upsetting about it, but a kind of exhiliration and curiosity as i began to follow it more closely; i expected the lights to shift, to take on a more familiar mechanical motion or in some way show that this was an ordinary phenomenon, maybe several small craft, viewed from an unusual perspective. it wasn't. it's speed remained constant, and after a few minutes, never altering its course, it was lost to view.

   it took about as many minutes to get to my home & i told my family about the experience, but didn't think to report it to anyone. a couple of days later, the 'phoenix lights' sightings took place, and i recognized a difference between the sighting of the lights over the south valley & those reports of an object that corresponded to the one i'd witnessed.
content.summary: Flattened v-shaped lights on a  boomerang object

content.detailedDescription: My husband, son and i were driving home last night, we were 50 miles north east of mcgill nevada (home) and saw a big, bright orange ball of light appear out the front window of the truck directly in front of us (east) it just hung there for about 10 sec then disappeared. we all asked each other if we had seen it, we had. about 30 sec later it showed up again out the drivers window (north) and we all started yelling and i pulled over, by the time i had stopped it was gone. we got out of the car and  it popped up in front of us again. so i took out my little camera and waited, a few sec later saw it way far off to the north east, really dim then it kind of blinked out and it was right in front of us again but there was 2 of them. they just hung there for about 10 to 20 sec, i got some video of them then they just disappeared. all the cars that had been behind us had pulled over and were watching, and a man pulled up next to us and asked if we were seeing this. while we were talking they re-appeared but this time there were 3 of them, they just hung there then kind of bounced up and down, hung there again, then they were just gone. i also go a little of that on camera. all of a sudden it seemed there were jets coming from all directions, there had been no sound until the jets showed up, and after the jets came we didn't see the lights again. they were very large and bright orange, similar to looking a street lamp from about 50yards away. it really was the most awesome thing i have ever seen. i have the footage on my camera but have not downloaded it yet, i also drew a pic but i have no scanner.  my son was scared out5 of his mind, my husband and i were both really excited, as was the man that pulled up next to us. the whole thing lasted about 20 min or so we stayed and watched for nearly half an hour more and saw nothing else except lots of jets flying around. my family watched out the back window of my truck the whole way home and saw nothing else.
content.summary: Strange lights in the nv sky

content.detailedDescription: I was ten years old, i made a walk about every other day approx 3 miles to get 5 gallons of kerosene for our stove.  there was snow on the mountain road.  as i was about one mile into my trek with the kerosene heading back to our small mountain home, i noticed a bright light following me through the trees.  i got scared and tried to run, but the 5 gallon can of kerosene was slowing me down.  it was just about dark and i was surrounded by mountain treeline with no neigbors.  the light followed me for about half a mile to one mile, then finally disapeared behind a hill.  i could not tell what the light source was and that made me even more scared. when i returned home, there was a friend of my father's at the home.  he was talking to my father stating that he was approaching the house after using the "outhouse" and noticed a large object above the house.  i overheard the conversation, and explained what i saw.  we all joked and said that we saw a "ufo".  to this day, i am not sure what it was.  my father claimed that the house had lost all electricity for a few moments at the same time his friend was using the outhouse.  we were country and seemed like another mountain event at the time.  carl shaw
content.summary: Ufo sighting while walking home.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were taking our dogs outside around 7:30pm cst, while observing the few stars/planets not drowned out by the nearly full moon. while looking at jupiter, 5 minutes later, i noticed what appeared to be a satellite moving underneath it, from south to north. it was a star-sized white light, and living a mile from the regional airport and numerous military airfields, i am confident saying it was probably not an aircraft. i say it resembled a satellite because we've seen the iss, space shuttle, hubble, and other large objects in orbit passing at their prescribed times. this particular "satellite" passing by jupiter seemed to light up, or appear, while on a staight trajectory to the north, nearly 45 degrees from the eastern horizon. it's path lasted only about 5-10 seconds, before it went dark. it was far too slow to be a comet or shooting star, and too fast for a plane at that distance. after it disappeared, i followed the same speed and direction visually, to see if it would reappear, but it did not return. i began to describe it to my wife, who had not seen it. while i pointed towards jupiter and motioned the direction of what i saw, an additional light appeard about 70-80 degrees up in the eastern sky, just a few "inches" above jupiter, moving in south-southeast heading. my wife instantly saw this other "satellite" which we both describe as a star- or satellite-like white light, moving quickly and deliberately. the part that caught my attention, is that the second object, continued on a path that intersected the path of the first object, just seconds later. it continued traveling south-southeast for another minute or so before also just fading away. i have heard that there are many satellites that cross paths, and nearly miss often. but, minutes later when i checked the satellite tracker for our area, no satellites are to pass for another four nights from now! in the past several months, we have noticed, to our suprise and awe, lots of "runaway stars" in the night sky between 8-10 pm. most are mundane, but some change directions. tonights objects were intriguing because of their apparently close proximity, and the fact that no satellites were scheduled to be passing over. i have seen hundreds of shooting stars, and these objects were both not shooting stars. i suppose they could be top secret super-sonic high alt. military planes, but they are not very top secret if they have blaring white lights on them. i will keep my eyes to the skies watching these "moving stars" at night, as we see them quite often from our backyard.
content.summary: Two objects looking like satellites crossing paths within seconds before disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my room with the light on.  i was looking around my room; i noticed the reflection on my window looked different and my dogs were barking.  a large, and very soft gree light right outside of my window was distorting the reflection of the light coming from my room in my room.  there was an object just outside my window.  i could make out the object as a long, slinder object, hovering 5 feet about the ground below the horizon of my window.  the green light was solid. the ufo had a red light that was blinking behind it.  i observed the object as it moved from left to right slowly going out of my line of sight, but staying close to the ground.  i felt overwhelmed and fascinated; watching the object, i felt absolutely no threat.  i felt psychic/ghostly type energies eminating from it(this made me feel like i was being watched).
content.summary: It was long and narrow. it was very reflective and had a green light on towards the back of it.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting outside in my lawn chair enjoying the evening as it was just becoming dark. live in a rural area with open skies, good visibility ... often look at the evening sky, watch celestial bodies, airplanes, man-made satellite, owls, etc.

take notice of all moving objects, but this one more intently because the light seemed brighter than other airplanes, and it made no noise.

when i first spotted it, assumed it was just another airplane; but after a few seconds, wondered if it was a satellite.

it was a bright white, round light, about the size and brightness of venus or jupiter.  moving from nw to se at about the same speed and altitude as a plane.  deduced that it was not a plane because (1) no flashing red or other lights; (2) never heard a noise coming from it; (3) moved more like a satellite ... gliding, floating ... propulsion seemed different than that of a plane.  possibly a hard body / craft beneath the light, but hard to distinguish in the dark.  although it moved like a satellite, it was too low and too bright to be one.

it was out of the ordinary ... i questioned if a plane would be flying without the red blinking lights ... and the silence was definitely odd.

i lost sight of it when it seemed to vanish before reaching the horizon in the se, probably due to cloud cover.
content.summary: Bright white round light moving silently, sw to ne

content.detailedDescription:
I was making videos of the clouds and the sky because the atmosphere seemed a little weird.
later i went through the videos, going slowly with some, as patience allowed. what i thought were birds (didn't remember particularly noticing them in real life) don't seem to be, when individual frames are isolated. i decided to send in sample pictures so you could see the similarities to:
http://www.Mufoncms.Com/files/19754_submitter_file2__2009054.Jpg
in the report:
"2009-09-30	2009-09-26	i was taking pictures of a storm but when i looked at them today, there were 3 unusual objects in only one of the pictures! the objects were not in the other 2 pictures taked at the same time...	wi, us"
this is the second oddity matching another wi submission and i have a third matching report of something else from wi.  i'll submit it as soon as i create an illustration.
content.summary: Birds not really birds - like a deercam pic from wi

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west on the i-10 bound for los angeles ca coming from litchfield park az. i notice a bright group of flashing/rotating lights coming from the southwest in the direction on the highway. my first thought was i am looking at a helicopter approching. but at second glance the motion
was all wrong for a copter. it hovered then had a short burst of acceleration the hovered the a very fast acceleration covering what i estimated to be about 5 miles in a matter of seconds. i am still thinking "this must be a chopper !" the craft the in a final burst of speed crosses the highway in front of me, i estimate it is about 150 to 200 feet high and its huge! maybe 200 feet across, i can see 2 very bright lights at the ends of a long fairly thin dark structure, as the craft banks to the east it pauses in its turn and tilts slightly and hovers for just a second or two. at this point i can see three lights at the edges of a very large dark structure with a multitude of multi color chasing lights stemming from its center to the lights at its points, as it makes a very tight turn to the right. there is no sound at all ! as it turns the 3 main lights turn to a dim red in color, i can see it is triangle shaped, equal sides. as the craft passes over my truck it seemed to be turning on a central axis as it banks (kind of like a frisbee toy) at this point i have no idea what this thing is! it heads back southeast and i can see that the sides of the triangle are a bit concave and have a "airfoil" shape giving it the apparance of a 3 point boomerang ( a bit fat in the center) i can clearly make out a 4 centrally located light orangeish in color as it pulls away i can clearly see it had rows of lights on the edges of the body. the body was black but had a slight "shimmer" to it. i was driving about 65 or 70 miles per hour and this thing completes its turn before my truck can pass under it. as it clears the highway it pulls out at a very high rate of speed
and is heading toward the southeast in the direction of what i assumed to be the goodyear muni airport (saw the blue runway lights in the distance) and in a second or two it was half way to the horizon. then it was just a speck of light (still flashing) on the horizon. i was amazed, still no quite sure what i had just seen, then a bit frighten! the totally excited, the images kept replaying in my head! the whole thing had a serreal feel to it. i have never seen anything remotely like this. i kept doubting what i saw trying to come up with a logical explanation for what had just occured. i could not think of anything else to do so i posted it on my facebook page while i was driving. then i called my wife and told her. i had to stop at the very next rest stop to compose myself. i kept watching the sky for most of the remainder of my drive to los angeles. i kept thinking "it should have made some kind of a sound!" i have always wanted to see proof of these type of aircraft, now that i have seen this one i my not so sure i would like to confront another !
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was westbound on i-10 see an aircraft approching from the southeast, hovering then accelerating covered approx 5 miles in 5 seconds. flys over my truck, banks hard making a 180 deg turn, triangle in shape, no sound what so ever,  lots of lights !

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bed room and i looked out my window and saw an extremely steady bright light. i live in the country and there are roughly three airports near by, along with the air force. therefore i have seen many planes and flying aircraft, and this was not a plane. i went outside to get a better look and the light got bigger and bigger and seemed to be really high up in the air and really far away. it then turned and moved west and as it moved further southwest, it got smaller. as it turned i could see almost a red glow come from it, and then red and white lights began flashing. this all happened within roughly five minutes or so.
content.summary: Extemely large and bright ball of light

content.detailedDescription: On thursday october 1, 2009 at 9:15 pm i received aphone call from my wifes granmother (velma). she stated to me that their is a round bright white in color object that was circling in the sky  near my home. my son eric stephenson and i went outside of my home and looked up into the sky and observed the object. i tried to take pictures but they didn't turn out. i then contacted my uncle bill stephenson a mufon investigator from new jersey and informed him of this event. he told me to contact mufom.  there was no other craft in the sky and the object had no sound with it.
content.summary: Round unknown object white in color is circling my home.

content.detailedDescription: Ufo seen going at a much faster speed than any conventional aircraft.  the object was far away, looked like a small ball of light.  when first noticed it was blinking red and white lights.  all of sudden it was like somebody turned on the lights.  the object looked like a ball of light and kept going at the same speed as before.  it vanished into the clouds and out of sight.
content.summary: Ufo seen going at a fast speed.  blinking/changing colors, lit-up like a light bulb and kept going.

content.detailedDescription: The one star like shaped object fell downward through the sky and turned into 2 as they were getting brighter and dimmer. the two star like objects began to fall and turned into a total of 4 bright star like shapes which were not falling directly to the ground but were slowly zig zagging in the air. as i was observing them they were starting to dissapear slowly one by one. it did not appear to be a falling star or a shooting star which i have seen throughout my life nor did it appear to be any type of fire work or air plane. i must add that another friend of mine saw the same thing in another city. i was not the only person to witness this activity in the sky as it was happening. it was brought to my attention by another fisher that was on the bridge i was fishing off of. as i was watching this in the sky i couldnt help but think there must be something else out there in our universe. i've never seen anything like this before. the way they moved through the sky and how they were getting brighter and dimmer didnt make any sense. i've never believed in any ufo sightings or anything in that category but tonight has changed my mind....
content.summary: One star like shaped object falling from the sky  turning into four as it descended .

content.detailedDescription: On the month of august (approximately 26th) of 2007, my husband and i witnessed a falling  star that grew larger as it travelled closer  to us;  over the shoreline and just to the front of us, the "star" stopped, produced a star on each side (becoming 3) and the outer "stars"  moved slightly below the first star, and also "sprouted" two more stars of their own, thus showing a total of 9 "stars."  after just a few seconds, but long enough to be sure of what we were witnessing, as one unit they moved upward and vanished into the clear night skies.  the color was white/gold, and each was connected to a somewhat "sparkling" cord.  i have just recently discovered that a menorah can have 9 points.  it looked to be that:  a menorah.  my husband, who is retired from the police profession and always very skeptical, saw what i saw.  i don't know what my husband felt, but i felt as if the star was going to "land" on us where we were sitting.  i began to move my beach chair at that point (i thought to get out of its way), when it just stopped, and began to develop as i've described above.When it all disappeared up into the skies, i asked my husband, "did you see that?"  "yes," he said.  we were both very surprised and puzzled.
content.summary: Falling star that becomes larger, and ends with 9 "points" or "stars"

content.detailedDescription:
Please accept the attached photo for the above sighting above.
previous photo sent with report was deleted because a virus was discovered.

vincent p. tobias
content.summary: Two identical alien helicopters flyby h11, h12  photo

content.detailedDescription:
April 19, 2009, sunday, 12:50 p.M.,doheny state beach,dana point, ca 
blue / hazy sky . 

as i stood on the beach with other beachgoers, i heard a helicopter
propellar engines sound to my right, and i saw two helicopters approaching sse, 50 m.P.H. coming around the main harbor breakwater, and i immediately took this photo with my cingular lg c2000 mobile phone camera (.Jpeg, 320 x 240 pixels, 23 kb). 
     
two identical helicopters (h-11 / h-12), 50 foot lenght x 4 foot height,
two horizontal propellars: front, 2 foot diameter, rear, 5 foot diameter, appeared to have four-five, one-foot black square, side-center windows,speed 40 m.P.H.,sse, altitude 400 feet above sea level, distance 700 yards. close encounter of the first kind. it has a very vanilla-threatening  appearance, no questin. clearly seen in the photo are below-center platforms which correspond to the window locations.  

six beachgoer witnesses, (see "celestial phenomena" second electronic edition, 41 vols., (c) 2000-09 by vincent p. tobias,vol. 17, video clip 46, clock time 13:09, vol. 3 book 1, table 11, pp. 177 / 78. 
                                                                          i am the author / discoverer of spaceships and extraterrestrial (eti) form of life on earth as documented in my book, above, websites www.Celestialphenomena.Net / com and blog.
content.summary: Two army tan elongated "blackhawk type" helicopters fly-by.

content.detailedDescription: I was worried about my daughter so i went out looking for her at a place that i knew she might be staying at.I started to notice that something was trying to get my attention.I looked through my rear veiw mirror and i saw a bright light way up high behind me in the sky.Once i noticed it it was like it knew it had my attention.I rolled down my window to look up at the sky to see if there really was something there.What i saw scared me this bright light was coming across in full view slowly stopping at times and then continuing to cross past me in the sky to my left.Chills were running up and down my back.I immediatley called my brother and told him what was happening to me., and that i felt that it was waiting for me to drive away from where i was parked.He stayed on the phone with me and said., keep me on the phone and drive over here and pick me up.I said okay stay on the phone please...I"m very scared.As i drove off the light in the sky started to move with me.As i pulled on to a clear open road i hit the gas pedal as fast as i could my brother was only a couple of blocks away from where i was.I sarted to cry uncontrolably because all of a sudden i felt  like something was going to take me .There was such a strong force field coming up behind me i could feel it through my bones through my hair teeth and my nails a strong presence.I looked through my rear mirror and i saw this huge enormous light at least two car lengths wide coming fast up behind my car it was right on my bumper.I started to  scream real loud i was crying and trying to not wreck as fast as i was going.All of a sudden it disappeared as fast as it had appeared the first time like it was never there. my brother was waiting in the front yard for me he said com down sisiter let me get in the car and lets go see what it is we went all over abilene looking for something we never found.I do remember tyhat it would come in and out of the street light fixers close to the highway lights so that at first i didn't know it was following me that night before it tried to get as close as it did to me.I feel that it sensed how scared i was and how disstraught i was that it made a decision to leave me alone that night in question.
content.summary: Fast very bright could appear and disappear in a wink of an eye

content.detailedDescription:
My ufo encounter

it's about time i told of this account, and got it on record. 
 
i cannot recall the exact year or the date, but i think it was sometime in 1967 or 1968. a word about the technology of the time - there were no personal computers, scanners, digital cameras, fax machines, hand calculators, hard drives, printers, cell phones, cds, vcrs, video cameras, or microwave ovens.

first let me preface this by saying i was at the time a very light sleeper. i had two young children in an old wooden house and i was very worried about fire. my wife and i slept upstairs and the children downstairs, and i could hear a pin drop. when i related this story to others, their first reaction was to try and come up with a rational explanation. since it happened while i was in bed the first reaction was ���" you were dreaming." i suppose that was possible, but i know the difference between a dream and reality. although a dream can be as real as it gets, once you wake up you realize that you were dreaming. 

the bedroom upstairs was a converted attic with double hung windows at either end. our bed was situated under the south window with the head against the window and the foot towards the north window. the north window was open that night. it had no screen on it.

suddenly i was startled out of my sleep by a flash of light emanating from the north window. i thought it was lightening and was wondering if i should close the window to keep out the rain should it start to rain. then i noticed that there was something hovering about 3 feet outside the open part of the window. it appeared to be about 12 inches long and about 1/2 inch in height. it had an iridescent glow. it was not moving laterally, and appeared quite stationary. i was fascinated. "what the heck is that " i thought. i was lying on my back with my head raised slightly by the pillow. it hung outside the window for about 10 seconds when it began to move in through the window. now my curiosity suddenly changed to concern. it was about 3 feet off the floor and moving slowly toward my feet at a rate of about one-foot per second. i watched in fascination, not in fear, but motionless as it hovered past my toes. i decided that when it gets a little closer i would make my move and grab it.  as it floated over my stomach i made my move, or tried to make my move. when i went to grab it i realized that i was paralyzed. i could not move a muscle. as it moved closer to my i head i could see that it's shape was round like a fluorescent bulb, there were no distinguishing features - only this eerie glow. at this point i should have been scared to death, but i wasn't. it stopped moving when it got over my face. it was about one foot above my eyes. then it started making noise. sort of an electronic gibberish that i had never heard before. (in retrospect, it sounded a lot like a computer connecting to the interned through a modem)  it hung directly above my eyes for about ten seconds making these weird sounds. then the sounds stopped. i still could not move a muscle. it hovered motionless above my face for several second then rapidly accelerated toward the open window. as it began to move my muscles came back to life, but i had no chance to catch it because it was out the window within a second. once out the window it veered up and eastward. by the time i raced to the window it was gone.

oddly, when i relayed this event to my next door neighbor a couple of days later, he and his wife had a "ball of light" story of their own. they claimed a ball of floating light, some years earlier, had startled them while cleaning up after dinner. it floated through the glass of their closed kitchen window. they said it was about 9 inches in diameter. they were scared and stayed well away from it. it floated very slowly about shoulder high through their kitchen, turned 90 degrees, then moved through their living room and out through a glass storm door. they said it floated slowly across the street and hit a dog that was sitting on the porch of a home across the street. they said it killed the dog.
content.summary: Floating bar of light entered my bedroom and paralyzed me.

content.detailedDescription:
We were flying kites with the kids one afternoon.  we took multiple pictures of the kids and of the kites.

we have several pictures of our "penguin" kite 200 ft up.  later when we looked through the photos we could see that there was something butterfly shaped far above the kite!

the object only appears in one of the pictures, not in the photos taken before and after. for this photo, we had zoomed up onto the kite because it was at the top of several rolls of kite string and was higher than the other kites would go.  the object above the kite seems to be very high up, colored, and we have not idea what it is.

we didn't see it live; just saw it when reviewing the photos later so don't know how fast or slow it might have been moving... if we hadn't zoomed in, i'm not even sure we would have been able to see it.
content.summary: Flying kites, we took a pic of our kite 200 ft up, and later saw in the pic there was something butterfly shaped far above the kite

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south bound toward morton illinois on i74. myself and my brother, where heading to his fathers house, where i was dropping him off. we came about 1/2 mile from the west/south bound split on i74 just outside of morton. directly ahead of us, we both saw a light, about the brightness of a helicopter, or airplane light, falling exactly straight towards the ground. it was hard to tell about how far away it was, possibly 5 miles or more.
the light was not flickering or flashing, it was a steady light, as it fell directly toward the ground, it disappeared about 100-200 feet above ground.
when it came into view, it was only as high as we could see it out the windshield. what made us noticed it at first, was the contrast of the light from the cloudless country sky. there where little to no clouds in the sky, as most stars where viable, after just few seconds of focusing on them. 
the light itself was much closer than any star. 

the velocity of the light falling, was that of an object being dropped, like the force of gravity. it was not slow, nor was it oddly fast. it seemed like an average falling speed, for something like, dropping a baseball, or rock.
like i said before, it seemed like 100-200 feet above ground, it dimmed out, until it was no longer visible. the light itself was not visible or traceable after it was darkened. the rate that it dimmed, was that of a headlight, or lamp, being turned off. 

myself and my brothers personal feelings after seeing this, where in awe. we kept asking ourselves, what it was, or where it had fallen. we where both talking and thinking about it for at least a few hours, i still am as i write this. i have not been able to think about anything else since then, it was a little more than an hour ago, it is still fresh in my mind.
content.summary: Traveling southbound on interstate towards morton il, saw light falling straight towards ground,

content.detailedDescription:
Account of amber timberlake: i saw an object travel from the sky in front of us to the left side of our car very rapidly. it then hovered, disappeared, and reappeared numerous times before flying off over a hillside.

account of steven biars: i was driving amber's car back from ashland when we saw a bright object lighting up and then disappearing. the object appeared to hover on the right side of the road, near mountain enterprises, perhaps a few hundred feet in the air. i initially thought it may have been a parachute plane because there are several local flyers in this area. it quickly became apparent that this wasn't a plane. the object lit up brightly before disappearing. it then reappeared and shot across the road before stopping and hovering again. a small white light on the underside and a brilliant blue light on the upper side began to flash. a pinkish colored light on the front of the craft also brightly lit, but it wasn't flickering like the white and blue lights. shortly thereafter, the craft disappeared before reappearing yet again. i pulled over to attempt to get a picture with my iphone. as i was trying to take a picture, the craft shot over a hillside. i got back on the highway and turned around to follow the craft, but it was gone. i believe it must have followed industrial parkway or stayed invisible.

i have reported a previous event with cathy richards from mufon of ohio. this craft was very similar to the craft i reported to her. having had experience with mufon in the past, i told amber that we should file a report after seeing the craft.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo near intersection of us 23 and industrial parkway (near wurtland, ky)

content.detailedDescription: I work at a haunted house in middletown, de on rt. 13 south of the st. georges bridge. several of the hayride actors (including myself) boarded the tractor to take us to our positions along the route. as we waited i heard someone said, "hey look at that". what i saw was a cone-shaped burst of light accompanied by slight haze. it looked like a light from a helicopter beaming towards the earth, however it was to high to be a helicopter. then i was struck by the mist, because it was an remarkably clear night, not a cloud in slight. the light was extremely bright, then i thought maybe it was a shooting-star, but the tail always follows these phenomena not the other way around. there was no sound, and the light didn't appear to move. the light was visible for at least four minutes then the brightness vanished, but there was still a trace of light the lingered a faded. the only thing i could come up with is maybe an experimental aircraft (because of dover af base located about 25 miles away), but the still does not explain the fog and the strange light. after serving in the marines for 5 years i seen a lot of aircraft, i've never seen anything like this. there were at least 20 of us who all saw the same thing. none of us were scared, more intrigued than anything. we all joked about seeing a ufo, but after looking back, it's my only explanation. i including a sketch of what it looked like, and the direction i was viewing it from.
content.summary: Cone-shaped burst of light accompanied by slight haze.

content.detailedDescription: Dear sirs over the last two years i have been putting out deer cameras out on my farm to photo deer.My camera has been pickin up some strange things i cant explan what its taking photos of.I was not there when the photos were taking.The camera is triggered by heat not by movement.Ill attach the some of the pics from the last two falls and send them to you.Please let me know what you think they might be thank you steve kolczynski
content.summary: Pictures taken by a trail camera for taking pictures of deer

content.detailedDescription: I was taking several pictures, so took several in succession, because the subject was interesting to me.  anyway, i was walking down highway 35 about 3 miles away from trempealeau, wi, usa. so today i used my camera for something else and looked over the pictures one by one on my computer that i had taken just a couple days before. ( trempealeau mountain has been considered sacred to the ancient people around here.) it is the mountain you see in the pictures. i did not notice any such object until i looked at the pictures on my computer. i thought that maybe it could be a leaf blowing by, however the shapes seemed quite odd to me and i thought that maybe you all could look at these and tell me what you thought. there was alot of energy coming in with the storm, but i don't remember a lot of wind at this time, and the other pictures that i took do not show any wind either. what do you all think? i am sending pictures of all 3 pictures, which have the same exact time on all of them (i think the camera says a.M., but it should say p.M. as the pictures were taken in the afternoon.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of a storm but when i looked at them today, there were 3 unusual objects in only one of the pictures! the objects were not in the other 2 pictures taked at the same time...

content.detailedDescription: I went out to smoke a cig. looked up and saw a silver disc shaped ufo partly going into what appeared to be a hole in the sky. it moved very slowly and was being swallowed into the hole. it was like the sky opened up because the stars were not in there place. they were warped somewhat and as it finally went through, which took a few seconds, the sky closed behind it and they stars went back to thier original position. never seen a ufo do this before.
content.summary: Ufo going through hole in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on my deck looking up at the sky.  i noticed the object because it was different than the aircraft i had been seeing.  it was a solid light, no blinking.  it was as faint and as small as the more distant stars you would see in the night sky.  it moved quickly across the sky, diagonally across the air traffic lanes i had been seeing, in a straight line, and in my opinion, very high in the sky.  a few minutes later i noticed it coming back on the same path it had taken.  i thought maybe it was a satellite but i wasn't sure if satellites moved that quickly across the sky and if they would have one moving in the opposite direction of another ones path.  it was different than anything else i had seen in the night sky, ever.  i lost sight of it the first time when its path was blocked by trees and on its return trip when it was blocked by my house.

i watched for approx. 30 minutes longer but saw nothing coming from either direction the object had traveled from.

in the sky over me, aircraft were moving from ne to sw in various lanes.  this object moved first from n to s and then from s to n.
content.summary: Solid pale light moving across sky

content.detailedDescription:
I might have found a rather huge smoking gun, but it needs checking, verification and analysis by others with photoanalysis and/or lunar surface expertise. can you help? 

in the latest version of google earth you can tour the moon's surface. copy and paste this lunar coordinate to jump there ...  22.514n  21.353e  zoom in such that the scale is labeled approximately 2000 meters.  zoom in ond out a little to help you see a very faintly outlined, but perfectly shaped tilted square area just south of this coordinate where the image appears to have been doctored. 

now, with the zoom level still still showing the scale labeled at about 2000 meters, start scrolling to the south, and just slightly towards the west.  you'll see a faint, nearly straight-line path that i've calculated continues at a very steady heading for 100.9 kilometers (about 63.7 miles), all the way to the edge of the high-resolution area of the images.

this path is too consistent in size, appearance, consistent heading, and length to be a fracture line, rolling boulder from an impact, or any other natural phenomenon i can think of. similarly, it doesn't have the characteristics of an image processing flaw (unlike the many other glitches seen in these images, and so it very much appears to be something actually on the moon's surface that was photographed. 

the path fades occasionally near the north end, but can still be made out, with careful observation, right up to the doctored square area. i could find no trace of the path to the north of this area at all.

i suggest starting at the coordinate given above and then scrolling mostly to the south from there. however, the following coordinates are for reference and detailed location of the tilted square doctored area of the image if required.

a typical point along the path, near its middle
20���48'15.60"n
20���53'1.06"e
 
the southern-most end of the path, where high-resolution imaging stops
19���15'45.62"n
20���27'5.97"e
 
the top corner of the tilted square area at the end of the path
22���30'47.72"n
21���21'10.29"e
 
left corner of square area
22���30'32.23"n
21���20'14.42"e
 
right corner of square area
22���29'58.23"n
21���21'34.61"e
 
bottom corner of square area
22���29'42.74"n
21���20'37.42"e

who do you know who is an expert on lunar geology or geography or photography who can help decided if this path is likely natural or artificial? also, if the doctored square area can be proved to be "photoshopped" or similar, then is there someone at nasa or asu who can be held accountable for an explanation?
content.summary: Lunar anomaly

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting my friend julie, who lived in fernandina beach, fl, at the time.  her condo was located across the street from the beach so instead of going to bed i went to sit on the beach as it was unseasonably warm and there was no moon that evening and given fernandina beach is 30 miles north of jacksonville, there was hardly any light pollution making the stars seem brighter than i'd seen them in a long time having lived in a large city for so long. a few minutes after sitting down and gazing east at all the stars over the ocean, something unusual caught my eye.  over the sea - i estimate it was approximately 1 mile away (it seemed to be above some fishing boats moored off-shore) and about 35-40 degrees above the horizon, was something that resembled a 55 gallon drum (not so long as to qualify as a cylinder - but it was the only shape that fit) shaped object having alternating red and blue lights studded on it, slowly rotating counter-clockwise.  of course, at first i thought it was a satellite, but as i watched, it started moving up, down and around enough to indicate it was not a satellite.  still scanning the sky, i spotted another object exactly like the first - north of it, except this one was a bit smaller or perhaps further out, i don't know.  the objects were spaced just far enough apart that i couldn't watch them together.  after approx. 15 minutes, i returned to the condo to get julie so she could come witness these objects with me and to see what, if anything, they would do.  at about 11:30, the smaller ufo to the north disappeared when we were not looking so we concentrated on the larger object.  finally, a little after 1 a.M., the object started rotating faster and faster until the blue and red lights became a blur of purple.  the purple light then got brighter and brighter in color until before our very eyes - it turned into a star!! i was dumbfounded.  i asked julie, "did you just see that ufo turn into a star?"  "yes," she said.  the ufo turning into the star took less than a minute.  the crazy thing was this thing now looked exactly like all the other stars in the universe and i've never looked at stars the same way since always wondering, "are you really a star?"  too, when i got back to work at the law-firm on monday, i related my experience to an attorney i worked with and she said she'd seen something similar happen in florida years earlier, whereby a ufo turned into a star.  unfortunately, my camera would have never picked up on this object.
content.summary: Saw 2 spinning cylinders over atlantic ocean in fernandina beach, fl

content.detailedDescription: I was in sudbury ma with 2 friends on a nice back road sitting on a bench on a small lake. we were hanging out talking smoking a few cigars. being as curious as i am i looked up at the sky for a while it was a clear day with only a few clouds in the sky. i was looking up towards my top left and i saw an object what appeared to be a blimp/disc like thing coming out over the trees. the object was white with big black holes all across the white it looked as if the black holes were spinning or as if the whole object was spnning. the object quicly jetted to the right and reapeared about what looked like a mile or 2 across the sky and then did it again to the right and then agian to where i first saw it. it did this for about 30-35 minutes and i could clearly tell it was not a plane bird or anything eles. i have no reason to come on here and lie about waht i saw. my father works for mufon and i am convinced what i saw was a ufo>.
content.shape: Blimp,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Oval,   Sphere
content.summary: A blimp/disc/circle object appeared in the sky miles and miles high above me

content.detailedDescription:
Last night, 9-29-09, i stepped outside into my front lawn not long after dark where my husband was watering the grass.  i am always looking up hoping to see something extraordinary.  this time, i was pleased to see what first appeared to be just a rather large star in the sky.  i was facing toward the north east, and the "large star" i had barely noticed was actually moving.  it seemed to be heading towards me.  i looked for blinking lights.  none.  i would say it was at about a 75 degree angle or so from the horizon.  with no blinking lights, and a similar sighting to this back in may, i was betting it wasn't a plane either.  after about 5 seconds of traveling in a south westerly direction, it veered to the left (my left) and turned around, going back in the direction it had come from.  then, moments after that, it started getting dimmer and dimmer and smaller and smaller until it completely disappeared.  the whole experience only lasted a few seconds, and after having done one mufon report during the summer, i thought quickly and looked at my watch which said 7:29 pm. 

as far as my feelings go, i was excited to see a similar object to the one i saw in may.  wished my husband had seen it, too.  other than that, neutral.
content.summary: Star-like object changed direction then slowly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I live in the country out near east tipp middle school. it was about 10-10:30 pm and i walked out my back door and around to the front drive to lock up my car for the night. just as got to the end of the sidewalk and to the top of the driveway i say a bright orange orb-like shape in the north, northeast sky. i stared at it for a moment as it was very bright and larger than any of the stars. at first i thought it might be a planet but after locking my car and turning back it had disappeard. it did not move, it glowed very faintly. i stopped and proceeded to lock up my car, as i was walking back less than a minute later i looked up again and it was no where to be seen. i was a little freaked out, i went into the house and told my step mom. she said that she and my dad have seen very similar things in that area in the sky and that they think it must be ufo's. i thought that was weird because my parents were very serious about it and they are not the type of people to believe anything that hasn't been proven to be real.
content.summary: Bright orage orb in northeast sky
